reviewText: All in all this is not a horrible release, but it's not as good as the first. The women are not as attractive and there are not as many who are natural. And the biggest thing is that there are a couple here who fail to show us the backside, which always leaves me feeling cheated. There are about 12 women in all (the first three are the best). Brief explicit on a few vignettes. Strange surprise: a silent (and far too short) appearance by the exotically-gorgeous Sasha Peralto, who already had staked a name in the Playboy family through memorable performances in such skin flicks as The Model Solution. No idea why she's in an "amateur" home video release, but I would have taken more of her in trade for the many long, dull minutes of a couple of the other women.
